messages.content: You need to detect stiction by the image provided. If the shape in the graph is similar to the sigmoid or the letter S shape, it means that the Sticiton phenomenon exists. The more similar the shape is, the more severe the stiction is. The more similar the shape is, the more severe the stiction is.
